, take the Conestoga Parkway north, which becomes Waterloo Regional Road 85 north of the city.  Regional Road 85 takes a left turn just south of Elmira; continue straight (on Arthur Street, Regional Road 21) to reach the town centre.

By car; the main street, running roughly north-south, is Arthur Street (Regional Road 21).  The main east-west cross street is Church Street (Regional Road 86).

Elmira is small enough to walk between any places on foot.
